item.title: Creating the dragon claw special 4 hits.. anyone know?
item.dc:creator: @skinzoskinz skinzoskinz
item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

I know this is probably a really common topic but i cant seem to find anything anywhere…

I tried to make my own using this code:

[code] public void claws() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664) {
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(30 + misc.random(10));
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(30 + misc.random(10));
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(30 + misc.random(10));
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(30 + misc.random(10));
SpecialDelay -= 1;

    } else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664) {
        int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
        int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
        int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        actionTimer = 4;
        SpecDamgNPC(30 + misc.random(10));
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
    SpecDamgNPC(30 + misc.random(10)); 
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
    SpecDamgNPC(30 + misc.random(10));
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
    SpecDamgNPC(30 + misc.random(10)); 
        SpecialDelay -= 1;
    }[/code]

But it gives an exception and breaks the server… cos its rubbish as you can see

I dont know how else to do it… any ideas?

Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Creating the dragon claw special 4 hits.. anyone know?
